name: MAYORS & COMMISSIONERS COALITION
description: Coalition of mayors and commissioners of communities along US-36 working to secure road improvement funding
sampleDescriptions: Developing and implementing a legislative strategy to request funding for improvements to the US36 corridor and implementation of MAP-21 under the surface transportation bill.
